statements: DELETE FROM GrantNotifications WHERE grant_id = 100 AND deadline_date < '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM GrantNotifications WHERE notification_date > '2022-09-15' AND is_notified = false;
DELETE FROM grant_recipients WHERE notification_sent = false;

DELETE FROM organizations WHERE org_name = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM grants WHERE organization_id = 3 AND grant_amount < 5000;
